website_summaries.verdict: A simple case that provides plenty of storage and protection.
pros: The hard rubber exterior feels durable and protective
8 open slots for extra games and SD card storage
The carrying handle is strong, with a rubber grip for comfort
The middle flap doubles as a screen protector
Large mesh pocket can easily fit extra joysticks or other accessories
Simple black design has a sophisticated look
cons: The case is identical on either side, very easy to open the case upside down

website_summaries.verdict: An EVA shell case that fits the Switch and a few accessories.
pros: This shell-style Switch case comfortably houses the console, cables, and three pairs of Joy-Cons
The elastic pocket holds accessories in place while protecting the screen
The pockets allow you to pack around eight game cards with you
cons: The mesh pocket doesn't always hold accessories in place

website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the RDS Deluxe, this compact carry case is constructed to carry all your on-the-go Nintendo Switch essentials while keeping its contents safe and secure.
pros: Specially designed for Nintendo Switch and must-have accessories
Lower compartment holds console and Joy-Cons
Microfiber divider keeps your screen protected and offers 8 slots for game or SD cards on the upper side
Mesh inner pocket provides room for extra joy cons and cables
Compact size is easy to transport
cons: No external markings can make it difficult to determine whether its right-side up before opening
Plastic odor which gradually dissipates after airing

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for the money, it all depends on what you want to carry with you. I don't have much now to haul but I have a few games and of course the Nintendo Switch with a pretty bulky case and guess what? It fits with it on it. That's the main thing I was looking for. It is the Mumba case which I also love. Fits small accessories as well but nothing big such as a charger or the small controller thst came with the console. Otherwise all is great like others have said. Good quality, pretty tough shell and good storage like the others.
customer_reviews.author: AARon

customer_reviews.title: The horrible smell of this case is almost too much to ...
customer_reviews.text: The horrible smell of this case is almost too much to bear. It smells like someone literally just smoked a pack of cigarettes a day for 3 years straight and blew smoke directly into the case. Additionally, not the fault of them, but the package was left in the middle of my porch in the rain when my balcony was a mere two steps further and completely sheltered from the rain. Picked up the Amazon box and it was soaked, including my contents within the box. Pretty awful service.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit accessories, puts pressure on joysticks, NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: While some reviewers showed photos of this case fitting their accessories including the AC charger, the product I got doesn't even come close to fitting the charger. I can't even force it closed. To do so would put unnecessary pressure on the console anyway. I also don't like how any accessories placed in the sides of the mesh pouch will put pressure on the joysticks, which is never a good idea. But the primary reason I give this one star is because the seller WILL NOT ALLOW RETURNS FOR ANY REASON! I thought shopping on Amazon was supposed to provide some safety to the buyer, guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Deeje & Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pink case! Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This case is wonderful. It's not too big and I love the bright pink hue of it. I didn't edit my pictures at all, It's really that bright. It's also the case to get if; like me, you ordered the Orzly comfort grip case. The grip case fits into the carry case without any problems with closing the case at all.. Keep in mind that if you do use the grip, it raises the switch a bit in the carry case. so less room on the top mesh pocket for large accessories like the Hori stand. There is a chemical smell when you first get this case, so I recommend leaving it opened up overnight so the smell will dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rutschman

customer_reviews.title: Not thick enough.
customer_reviews.text: It is simply not thick enough for me to feel comfortable putting another set of joycons in the top. I have to push to get it to close and zip. Any pressure is bad pressure. Sticking this in my backpack would have me worrying about broken joysticks the whole time. It is fine for just a Switch with connected joycons and some cables. Not at all for multiple controllers or even a car charger.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and smells horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my case today and I immediately noticed a very strong odor coming from the package. The case smells horrible and airing it out seems to have no effect. I honestly don't understand how this case has so many good reviews. It feels extremely cheap and not durable at all. Most importantly, it is NOT able to fit the charger for the switch in at the same time as the switch!
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for less than two weeks, and one of the elastic straps that secure the Switch in place has already broken. I purchased this case over the cheaper Amazon brand product because of the high reviews, but sadly, the quality leaves a lot to be desired. The case has had fairly light work to do in the time I've had it. It only carries my Switch, no accessories or game cartridges. I also haven't been hard on it while in use – just your basic day-to-day expectation of being able to take the Switch in and out of the case. If I had to purchase again, I would choose another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Appearance is great, but intended items end up jostling around with a bit of wiggle room. The switch moves around a bit but the straps keep it safe. Games can be stored in middle flap with no issue. Joycons being stored in top area risk coming out when you open the case and I have found it easier to open upside down to prevent this. All in all still happy with the product and the issues are relatively minor
customer_reviews.author: Corey G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad straps
customer_reviews.text: Honestly super disappointed in this case. My friend bought the same one, and his came with much thicker straps to hold down the switch. With very very light use (probably under 10x) mine are already falling off! Didn't last too long at all. If this was different, I'd for sure give it 5 stars, but with the switch loose in the case, it bumps around wayyyy too much.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: May have led to controller joystick sticking in up.
customer_reviews.text: I like the padding inside, it's perfect and very protective. However, it needs to design where to store power cord, which is a necessary item to carry. I put the original Switch power cord in the mesh pocket as flat as possible with the cord carefully tucked. The case kinda expands to accomodate the width of the power box and console, but I didn't realize how snug it was. Its pretty likely the pressure caused my left Joy-con controller to start sticking in the up position.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Orange and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried with the reviews saying that the orange was yellow but when it arrived, it is clearly orange. I think those that got yellow got a mispick but I am super pleased with my case and the color. It is exactly what I expected and was pictured in the description. My switch fits perfectly and the pocket easily holds the charging cord and a few other things. I have not used the game slots bc my games are all on the switch but I like that the flap protects the screen. It appears well made and should last a while with normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Goff

customer_reviews.title: It smells really bad.
customer_reviews.text: It is functional. It holds things very well. Although, the oder when you open it up will fill the room. It is kind of hard to explain but it is similar to burning rubber. 13 days after ordering it the wife and myself decided we no longer wanted the item (the smell is really bad). We go to Amazon's returns and it says most have a 30 day but for some reason this item is not eligible. I'm in Florida visiting the wifes granny. Next week I'll call to see if this issue can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Put this thing to the test. It works.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’ll just say it works well. Long story short, it fell out of the back of our truck bed going 75 mph and I’m thrilled to announce that the Nintendo Switch lived through what I can only imagine to be 30 or so hops along the asphalt highway. Not a scratch or internal injury. Thanks Orzly!
customer_reviews.author: Momma x 2

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case to ensure your console is safe
customer_reviews.text: A Nice hard shell case for the Nintendo Switch. Has a great netting in the top of the case to hold cables and extra joy-cons. The case holds 8 of your Switch games in the top mesh holder. The games are held in reasonably tight as they do not bounce around when we have the case closed up. We also purchased a protective case for the Switch and this carry case holds the Switch with this protective case also attached to it. The switch is held in with two elastic straps that slide on top of the unit. Great solid construction and makes it easier to know your gaming system is protected when it is on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, but just ok. My biggest concern is it shows the pictures of it holding 2 spare controllers and a charger along with a sleeve full of games, but then I put just the switch and the charge in it, it feels like I'm pressing down on the switch too much already. I'd recommend spend the extra $10 and get a slightly larger case, personally.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good case. Enough space to hold multiple joycons and a charger. Also holds a decent amount of games. Be aware that the color we got (Yellow) or other lighter colors seem to get stained easier than darker colors. Would purchase again, but most likely in a different color (Darker).
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy050970

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC SMELL!
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the positive reviews! Only buy this if you want to get sick, I'm not kidding. We bought to use on a car trip and as soon as we opened the box, the smell hit us; we aired it out for a few days, but once we were in the car with it, it was unbearable. I so wanted to throw it out the window. I wouldn't even DONATE this thing for fear of making someone sick. We ended up leaving it in a trash bin at the first gas station we could find - where with the stench, I'm sure it feels right at home!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome! I can comfortably fit extra controllers and my battery pack and still zip it up. It's very protective and durable. I love the pokeball colors!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: I like that the side for the switch has grooves for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Holds the switch and extra controllers or other peripherals as pictured. We have our switch and an extra set of controllers stored in ours. I like that the side for the switch has grooves for the device to sit in. A little hard to describe, but the switch with controllers fits nicely into the compartment. The only complaint I have is that the mesh side seems a little loose. I can see it stretching out over time, but I guess we’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: PatTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Small, won't fit any charger
customer_reviews.text: It is a good case and holdsy switch with a case on easily. I like the color and the handle. I bought it to carry my switch with me to work and travel. My biggest issue is that if I need to take my switch with me.... I probably also need the power cord to charch it. Which no way will the power cord or even the car charger fit in this case. I think if the case was just a bit deeper it would still be small enough to carry easily and toss in my bag while still being able to carry a charger. So I'm a bit disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: EckoKitten

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE, NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made product, mine seems to be used damage box with some stitches missing. Nintendo switch doesn't feel secure at all. Worst it says it can not be returned information like that should be on the top of the description. For couple more dollars you can get something better with warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Calderon

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cheap case the only reason why I’m knocking down ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cheap case the only reason why I’m knocking down a star is due to the fact of the smell. Some feedbackers will note this and they aren’t lying. I had to use Febreze Fabric Refresher to help kill the odor that was emitting from the case. Left it outside for a couple of days and using the Febreze to eliminate the odor. It worked but I shouldn’t have to go through all that trouble to avoid an unwarranted odor. If you plan on using this case as soon as you buy it, better look for another one as this case in an enclosed area would be bad news, i.e. your room or car.
customer_reviews.author: iKeablr

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Would have given a better star rating if they hadn't showed two extra joy cons in the pouch aside from the ones on the switch already. It's a load of crap, since if you even put one joy con in there with the switch on the bottom the lid won't come close to closing without harming the joy con. I bought a much better bag that fits everything that comes along with the switch and extra joy cons and only still have this because I haven't bought something to hold my game cards. Once that happens I'm gonna try to return this or sell it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great small case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I use this to carry my switch for day use around town. It’s perfect for stowing it and taking to work and out and around. It has just enough storage for a few cables and my headphones. It’s super light and feels really high quality. I’d definitely buy more from this company. I’m thinking of a larger one that will hold the dock and more for extended trips.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew James

customer_reviews.title: Good Traveling Case
customer_reviews.text: I placed this order 24 hrs ago and the package arrived at 9:45am the next morning! Very quick shipping, and I’m thrilled with that because we needed to get a carrying case quickly. Initially upon opening, the outer shell of the case seems a bit flimsy. However, it is exactly as shown on the product page. We are traveling for the holiday this week so, we will see how safe it keeps the Switch and accessories. I am pleased by how slim it is, so that I can put it in our travel backpack and not have to worry about a bulky case. I would recommend this case for the price, quality, and speed of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This case is fine. My biggest complaint is that the top pocket is open (no zipper or anything) and I have now had anything I put in there fall out by the time I open the case again. There were even times when it wasn’t fully closed and I dropped my charger. Considering how much this costs there are much better cases out there for the price! It’s also a bit of a pain to get your switch into the straps so it doesn’t move around the case. I ended up just getting frustrated and giving up on that, which means my switch moves around the case a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Has Everything I Need for Traveling with my Switch
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrying case. The bright pink makes it easy to spot. The hard case means no worries about harming my Switch. It has a place to store games, and a stretchy net area to hold extra cords and such. It even has elastic straps to hold the Switch in the case and prevent it from falling out while the case is open. I have absolutely zero complaints about this Switch carrying case. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a durable carrying case for their Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Raelyn Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great & affordable
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, this switch case is perfect for traveling and protecting games, joycons, and my Nintendo switch. More than enough space for games while traveling. Only slight complaint I could have is that the additional storage space can be kinda cramped for any additional joycons. If I try to close the case with a second pair, it may bump up against the switch, pressing buttons and moving the stick which wastes joycon battery. Not that major of an issue, can rearrange joycons to avoid this issue. All in all, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great for day trips
customer_reviews.text: We got this case to give our Switch a little protection when we bring it along for the car ride. Mostly we just pack the bare system in it without any accessories beyond the attached Joy-Cons, but we've also used it once or twice with spare Joy-Cons tucked into the top compartment. They're a little tricky to position such that they don't clash with the ones attached to the console, but it's workable. We ended up getting a bigger case for overnight trips where we want more of the accessories, but still prefer this one for day-to-day use.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Surprisingly Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ive never worn glasses but I got shampoo in my eye, started experiencing dry eye, and my eyes were hurting from staring at computer screens at work all day and video games at home Was skeptical if these were even legit but when you put them on you notice the subtle sepia tone that anti bluelight settings on android also display. Wore them while playing Borderlabds 3 for a couple hours and my eyes didnt hurt at all while theyve been hurting after only 15 minutes recently. And they actually look really good on me and not cheap at all. And they come with a case and microfiber cloth to boot. Very happy with with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Larry Booze

customer_reviews.title: Does not include screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: The case is great, however the box says on the side "2x screen protectors included" and they are not. I messaged orzly, and I was told this just means I can purchase them separately. So I feel like that's misleading.
customer_reviews.author: silkykeno

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I noticed on my own or else my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this case a handful of times since purchasing it in February. But I recently noticed that the straps inside are already frayed. Good thing I noticed on my own or else my Switch might have fallen out and shattered the next time I opened the case. I'd recommend you avoid this product due to the poor material quality!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Oh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits well, but handle stitching coming apart after just one day of use
customer_reviews.text: We loaded our new Switch, a few games, and the two joycons into this case, and after a day of carrying it around, the stitching is already starting to come apart from where the handle attaches to the case. I'm very disappointed because I have several cellphone accessories like cases from Orzly that are great quality... but this case??? Not so much, I had to return it and try another one. Maybe I just got a lemon, but to us it was definitely not worth the $20 we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy, with minor gripes
customer_reviews.text: Let's just get the bad out of the way: -The mesh pouch area is somewhat loose. JoyCons and their strap attachments fall out often, due to the awkward handle placement. However: +The case is mighty strong, with just the right amount of flex to cram into a bag without anything breaking +There are elastic bands to keep your Switch from falling all over the place due the aforementioned handle +The 8 card slots are pretty handy All in all, a solid purchase in my book.
customer_reviews.author: William Jackson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Order the protectors
customer_reviews.text: Case is sturdy, holds the console well, enough room for charger, battery pack, and games as well. The box of the case says it comes with 2 screen protectors so I was like cool I can process a return for the protectors and save a few bucks but alas they weren't in there which isn't a huge deal since I ordered them anyways but that's why this took a one star hit. Might want to fix that packaging Orzly. The lime green makes it easy to find in a mess of a room if that's an issue for anyone aside from that it's a solid choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good solid case
customer_reviews.text: I got this based on the price, and the appearance of storage capacity. The top net doesn’t hold stuff in very well, so that’s pretty disappointing. My charging cord always flys out of it. Besides that I really like this case. I can still play with the switch in the case because of where the straps are that hold in the screen. It holds a good amount of games, and holds them snugly. I’m very happy with this, aside from my charging cable always flying out of itb
customer_reviews.author: Review Chick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case if your focus is on being compact and durable
customer_reviews.text: The storage capacity of this case is low, but if that isn't your priority, then this case is otherwise perfect. It's just barely roomy enough to store the Switch without damaging it, and has just enough space for plenty of games, extra cables, and extra joycons. You will not be able to fit a pro controller or a dock in it, but again, if that isn't your goal then it's no problem (also, I recently got a small 3rd party dock that fits in the case) . Overall if you're someone who takes their Switch out to use in portable mode often it's an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Holley

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: If you're just looking for a cheap hard case to care your switch in then this is it. There's an image of the case being used to prop up the console that is completely false advertising. Pros It's a case The switch fits inside Holds a bunch of games Has capacity for some extra joy cons and an HDMI cable Cons The two elastic straps that hold it in are more in the way than anything. Can't just play out of the case. The case does not prop up the console Can't charge the console while in the case Not big enough to carry the AC unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The netting is not well suited for small objects (sdcard reader, jig, etc)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travelling with a modded switch. I thought the netting would keep my jig, sdcard reader, and usb controller adapter in place, however it seems it was only intended for cables as things easily fall out of the pocket. If I had known this, I would have looked for a different case. I would not recommend if your intending to keep small items in the net portion. For just protecting a Switch, it seems like it would do a good job, but If I only wanted to travel with a switch, I would want a thinner case.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: It's not great, design flaw makes this less impressive then it could of been.
customer_reviews.text: The case is too big, and the biggest issue is there are 2 very thin pieces of rubber that hold in the Switch nothing else, the hard case is sturdy in design, but there's too much room inside the case, it should of been made slightly smaller with a better method of holding in the unit. The other side is too large and has no dividers are all or storage compartments, if I put anything in the other side, it would jingle around and scratch the Switch. *This item needs a sturdier way to hold to Switch in place, it's also too large, this is a flawed design, and the product could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: erzendesign

customer_reviews.title: Great Switch case with lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case as a gift for a friend and they love it! They wanted a hard carry case that can carry games, and extra equipment, which the case does do, and so much more! The flap the holds the games, also acts as a screen cushion, so that the Switch screen does not get scratched by the extra equipment, and can help as a stand for the Switch. The mesh pocket has enough room to also carry extra joycons and wires. The case I got was pink, and so far hold the color with no fade or stain! With shipping, I give this Switch case 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: FishPhishGhoti

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good price!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the prices of "name brand" cases in stores, I was very happy to find this case for Nintendo Switch. It feels solid and holds several extra items besides the gaming unit. For the price, I don't see that you can beat it!
customer_reviews.author: TXMOMOF2

customer_reviews.title: it does what its suppose to, i just wish it had more space.
customer_reviews.text: knocked off a star because i couldnt fit all the cords. though i probably shouldnt because i needed a case promptly and didnt bother looking around (purchased because it said amazon choice and had 1k+ reviews) it does the job if im just taking the switch, games, other set of controllers and L/R attachments. but since i take it with me from my house to apartment and vice versa from time to time, i dont have space for all the cords. like i carry the dock and controller charging stating in my backpack/bag. but i would like to carry the hdmi cable and both power cords (dock/switch and charging station) in the bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy E.

customer_reviews.title: Best case, best price!
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for day trips with your switch. If you're just looking to go portable and don't need the dock, it holds the unit, all of your games, and even a few accessories. It's perfect for gaming on the go with your switch, and the hardcase really protects your switch well. It even has a screen protecting flap (that also holds games). Zipper is solid and this case has held up great running around with me for a week now. My brother has the same case for his switch and has owned it even longer. It still looks new!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: My children (ages 4,6,8) got a switch for Christmas. I ordered this case to help store the device and for travel. It is a great hard shell case and fits extra controllers and also has a storage slip built in for game storage. There are elastic straps that secure the switch into the side of the case. My child actually dropped the case with the switch inside and when I opened to inspect it nothing had moved! I would highly recommend this for anyone who plans to travel or has young children.
customer_reviews.author: Sagan Stroud

customer_reviews.title: My right joycon broke more than once.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my son, daughter, and my switches. Both my sons and my right joy con controller thumbstick stopped working which I suspect is due to this case. There is no similarity to how we handle our switches so despite everything else I like about this case ruining two expensive controllers has me worried it’s the case. Bought a new controller and using this case still will only verify with time. If it’s the poor design of the controller then I apologize to the maker of this holder.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hun

customer_reviews.title: A Great Case For The Cost
customer_reviews.text: This storage case for the Nintendo Switch (not Lite) holds the console well with the Joy-Cons attached. I bought this case over the ones readily available at BestBuy because for the same cost it offers internal storage for games. One complaint I do have is the factory charger does not fit in with the device. (As shared with other reviewers on Amazon.) However I usually have my backpack with me when I travel anyways so it’s not too much of an inconvenience for me. Overall it is a great case for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudwalker

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: After buying my switch I was worried about it getting scratched and keeping track of all of the little pieces that come with the system. This carrying case solved all of my worries! There are two little straps on the inside that hold the switch in place (with the controllers attached), a nice little 'flap' above it that holds about 8 games, and a mesh pouch for power cords and extra controllers. That is a case for handheld use only as it doesn't have room for the base stand. I would recommend this inexpensive buy to anyone looking for a quick, easy way to store or carry their system!
customer_reviews.author: BestBadger

customer_reviews.title: Great product, buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty good. It has good protection for the Nintendo switch. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the mesh pocket on the inside back of the case. It holds plenty of items but the mesh should go all the way to the top of the case, as it stands it only comes halfway up and whenever I open the case half the stuff in that pocket falls out. Other than that I highly recommend this case, its well made and shipped fast and the company has good communication with me as a buyer.
customer_reviews.author: KCPiranha

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: The case is very sturdy. It's a bit large so its not the easiest thing to carry around with you but that is to be expected. I feel comfortable taking my switch over to a friend's house without worrying about the device being free within my purse. Additionally - the all-black design is good because its versatile enough to leave be or decorate as I plan to do. It's simply an affordable and reliable case.
customer_reviews.author: Marina manzanares

customer_reviews.title: Great case. No odor! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Its very sturdy and has lots of pockets. It will definitely protect your Switch console. I would probably not sit on it or leave at the very bottom of your back pack though, but its pretty sturdy and will prevent scratching. Its very well made! I am always worried about getting cases for my gadget as I usually end up getting cases with bad odor even after airing it out but this case does NOT have that bad odor. I mean there is a new smell to it and I just left it open overnight and it was gone! I would buy it again if I buy another switch console 😉
customer_reviews.author: Chellie L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this case.  Convenient, well designed, sturdy, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Nintendo Switch case. It's discreet, flexible but sturdy, well designed (fits switch, joycon accessories, several games, has a soft patch that covers the screen and the small carry handle is great), and a great price point/value. I use it for travel, and otherwise store my switch in this case when not in use. The only downside is it doesn't fit the charger, but I don't see how you could without making it bigger and awkward. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrying Case
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case is a wonderful accessory to have for your nintendo switch. Good, durable case, and I love the selection of colors (both me and my sibling have one of these cases, I got purple and they got black). I don't own any physical games yet due to accessibility during the covid-19 stuff, but I tested it out with my sibling's cartridges and they fit securely. The pocket on top is nice, it fits slimmer accessories but not the switch charger. The switch itself is contained very nicely, with two straps to secure it into place. It also allows room for a slimmer fit case if you have one.
customer_reviews.author: Julien Remeika

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It seems fairly sturdy and well constructed, however it smells like a nasty old ashtray. The odor is quite foul and I haven't been able to get rid I of it. Would not recommend unless I just got a bad one. Update: Orzly is sending a replacement. Update 2: The second case arrived. It has a bit of a smell still, but leaving it out for a few days it has dissipated somewhat. It fits the switch and controllers with some game cartridges just fine (I read some reviews where people said it wouldn't all fit). Seems like a decent case for the cheap price, but I'm not going to say it's the best one on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Robertson

customer_reviews.title: extra joycons don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price, but does not live up to the images or description. I have an official case, but want something to carry extra joycons and cables. The images show you can, but what they don't show is how the joysticks press against the screen of the Switch when you try to close it. This is no good, and I am afraid it may lead to wear or damage. Also, the two elastic bands that hold the Switch in place get caught on the attached joycons, making it annoying to remove. I guess I will need to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Draconis Maxmillian

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Bang for your buck, this is a great purchase, but don't expect it to hold ALL your switch paraphernalia. But then again, I'm one of the oddballs that own three pairs of joycons and I bring them all with me during travel, and they DO fit. I could probably shove an HDMI cable in there if I didn't bring all my joycons What it won't hold: Switch dock (duh) Switch charging brick (duh) Joycon grip (duh)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Can't believe how great it is for the price! The top part (the lid) has enough space to fit a power bank to charge on the go and the USB-C it needs to charge. I think I could also probably fit a set of joy cons in there too. Bottom holds the switch nicely, plenty of space for games. Nice quality zippers. The whole thing fits into my handbag. I got this for myself, not my kid. Its perfect for on the go gaming, you can 't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Brito

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my switch and I love the Pokémon color. The case is big enough to fit my switch and a few accessories. I wish it was slightly larger to carry all of my accessories. It has a straps that hold the switch in place during traveling. It also has a protective flap so the screen will not get messed up during travel. It is pretty sturdy and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MoStyle

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid case - I've used it as a traveling case and my switch has seem to be pretty well protected. I've flown with it, tossed it in my backpack, thrown it in bags. Switch still comes out okay. The only thing I dislike about it is that I have a hard time fitting in the original charger with it. I do sort of stuff my charger in, but it does make it harder to zip. I wish the top was slightly bigger so you could fit your OEM charger more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good little case for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this case for our son's Switch as he and a group of friends get together to play. Pretty solid construction, holders for a few of the games he plays and almost enough storage for the cables. You can get the game, left and right controllers, and HDMI cable in the case with no issues. My only concern is also putting in the actual power cord as the plug is rather bulky and may risk damaging the game when included in the case as it has to be squeezed pretty tightly to zip it up. All in all, a good little case for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mile High Colt

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our switch as we travel often and I thought it would be nice to bring along. While this is a handy case with a nice handle and slots for everything to go in, I felt I had to dock it some stars because it’s not very thick or padded so I question its ability to protect the switch at all should I have to stick my bag in an overhead compartment on an airline. I would think if anything bumped it the switch would end up damaged even though it’s in a case.
customer_reviews.author: PJAKA

customer_reviews.title: Great case for your Switch - sturdy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for the Switch. Sturdy, with room for all of the accessories. A must-have to keep it organized and transport it safely and securely. One note: we bought this (unknowingly) when it was mistakenly priced at half of what it was supposed to be priced at due to a mistake made by the vendor's employee who listed it. Since it was their goof, they notified me of the mistake but still honored the price. I felt that was a very stand-up thing to do and so I'd recommend giving more business to the this honest and reliable vendor. That said, the case would still be a good deal at $19!
customer_reviews.author: R. K. McInish

customer_reviews.title: nice but bulky
customer_reviews.text: It works for its intended purpose but you have to keep in mind that this version is a lot thicker than the original case. I honestly don't like it. Makes packing my packpack for travel and work really inconvient. I am ordering another brand that claims to be "slim but strong", so we shall see. As for this one, who knows... probably trash.
customer_reviews.author: JoelMG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Case for Everything SWITCH related!
customer_reviews.text: It only has space for 8 cartridges, but the case fits all SWITCH related items perfectly. The Switch is comfy encased in a sturdy material with a nice cover from the game cartridge slot pouch. It also has nice zippers. My son personalized his with Sharpie GOLD Markers. We chose the BLACK color because they were on sale and we needed cases QUICK...
customer_reviews.author: James Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for the price. It's just as sturdy and protective as other more expensive cases. It fits my switch that is in a plastic shell protective case. And it's got enough room for 8 games, charging cord, and a couple of extra controllers. The only things I would have liked a little more but wasn't really necessary at the price point would be more storage slots for games.
customer_reviews.author: eSTee

customer_reviews.title: Always Use Protection
customer_reviews.text: I got my switch very recently, so I'm kind of obsessed with it right now. This means whenever I go visit my boyfriend, it comes with me. Before the case I would just wrap it in a tshirt (protection level 20%). This case is adorable (I got it in pink) and now I feel comfortable bringing my switch with me everywhere (protection level 100%)! Bought this with the ORZLY Glass Screen Protectors and now my protection levels are at 110%. The only problem is if you don't have a smaller charger and use the AC Adapter that it comes with the system originally, that doesn't really fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Aug 16th 2018. Carry handle was the first to break. It just separated from one end of the case. Then shortly after one of the zippers failed. Yesterday the other zipper broke rendering the case completely useless. I think the case probably was used less than dozen times. I would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quirky set-up
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this case for my son's new Switch. So far, he says everything is just fine, but he noticed right away that the inner elastic, net pouch is positioned so that it is facing DOWN when you are carrying the case by the handle. Anything placed in the net pouch will probably slide part-way out during use. However, my son (14) does not want to return the case, because he thinks he will only be carrying chrging cables in the inner pouch, and doesn't care if they slide around. Otherwise, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my daughter to carry her switch in as we travel. It will fit the switch and I like that it has pouches for the games, however the plug will not fit in the case. We did force it to fit once and the zipper broke open... I was able to zip it back up because it does have a zipper on each end but it's a little disappointing that the plug doesn't fit since she will need it to charge the switch. It would just be nice if everything fit so it could be kept together.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a bare bones way to carry around my Switch during visits to the hospital with my mom. It fits in the inner pocket of most my army style jackets and you cant even tell it's there. I suppose I use it strictly as a way of keeping the screen protected from smudges and scratches during transport for these hospital visits, but I'd use and trust it for any anything except I seriously doubt it would prevent damage in a fall; it feels super flimsy, like if you bend it too much it'll crack.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - A compact case that CAN hold my Switch WITH the protective case on
customer_reviews.text: I no longer need to pack my switch and my protective case separately. This case allows me to store it comfortably and safely along with game cases and accessories if need be. Very happy with this purchase! The pokeball-esque design is a plus since my kids and I are both fans of the series!
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet soft
customer_reviews.text: Both the case and the switch fit very well together allowing me to transport it without worrying about scratches or cracks. It contains everything I need for a quick gaming session and allows me to throw it in my backpack without worrying about it bouncing around. The material on the case won't damage anything else it rubs up against so feel free to store it with a laptop or another tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Thacher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy using this case for any travel, but I’m not sure how realistic their picture is where it can hold an extra 4 joy-cons. Even when I add an additional two joy cons and attempt to close the case, it feels as if it is pushing down relatively hard on the controller knobs, which over time will lead to sensitivity loss. Good buy if you are just transporting the system and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this, a really good carrying case for traveling and more, You have lots of room for games, accessories etc. But I just warn you, when it comes it has a rubber smell to it, but after a few days, it will go away and boom nice case!
customer_reviews.author: Svitlana Tsvey

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 8 months but does a good job protecting your games!
customer_reviews.text: Overall good case for what its its designed to do and that is protect your Switch. Its only been 8 months and the carry handle has snapped at the stitching and the zipper has broken off rendering the case unusable. I would say it has had below average use as we only use this case when traveling. Will I order another for the cheap price of $11....most likely. But wish it held up a bit better but again it does protect your Switch for a very low price.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Case that Holds Everything You Need!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case for traveling with my Nintendo Switch. It has plenty of space for an extra set of joycons and the switch charger, plus 8 games (9 if you store one in the Switch). I also appreciate that the cover isn't branded. No one looking at it would know that there's a $300 video game console in there, and the case is small enough that don't have to take the console out for the TSA. I've traveled a lot with my Switch, and this case keeps it looking brand new. I've had it almost a year now and still going strong! Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Z Boss

customer_reviews.title: Tops all other cases
customer_reviews.text: Really great craftsmanship. No sign of defects. Nice material. Easy too grasp, feels good to carry. Love the spacious pocket, however it would be best if it had a zipper to prevent things from falling out open opening. The sewn-in screen protector is lovely. I honestly appreciate the variety of colors this product comes in. The box the case comes in is spectacular. It makes you feel you bought something expensive. Overall I would buy this again and recommend to a friend. Customer service responds fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo A.M

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits perfect and the fit and finish of the case is ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't take consoles with me on trips other than my PS Vita, but now I had the opportunity to take my switch with me on vacation. I needed something strong with lots of space to accommodate the switch, games, charger and an extra set of joycons without the case being too big and the Orzly Carry Case fit the bill. Everything fits perfect and the fit and finish of the case is great. No complaints here and am very pleased with my purchase. Definitely check them out if you're looking for a case for you nintendo switch.
customer_reviews.author: Gori11a_White

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry Case
customer_reviews.text: The description given of "hard case exterior" is very subjective... This is a great case for the money, but you should be cautious of where you leave it... The case is very light weight... It fits everything exactly as shown in the pictures, so that's well worth the price paid... This case makes taking everything much easier for longer car rides... The bright yellow also makes it very easy to find too!
customer_reviews.author: Nick4TUNA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well designed. ⭐
customer_reviews.text: This case is really well made! Very sturdy and definitely feel like it would protect my switch if I were to drop it. I think the structure of it is great too, doubling the use of the panel for keeping the screen from getting scratched and game storage. My only nitpick is that if I want to go anywhere with it i have to store the charger separately as it doesn't quite fit. Definitely understandable but I would love if it fit in there comfortably with the switch. Otherwise a great case and I'm glad I decided to get this one. ⭐
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: when i opened it the smell was like it had been baking in the sun all day ...
customer_reviews.text: 1. the smell. when i opened it the smell was like it had been baking in the sun all day (it didn't). i shouldn't have to air a product like this out just to use it. been a few days. had it airing out and still smells! getting a different one. 2. i like the mesh net, but if you have loose parts (car charger) they fall out pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Protective. Good for travel or light carry.
customer_reviews.text: This case is on the slimmer side, making it easy to bring in a backpack or suitcase. It holds the switch, extra joycons or grips and up to 8 game cartridges. Its great for on the go because it is protective and slim. I love the added security straps to keep your switch snug. It will not fit a Nintendo liscenced charger as the powerbox is too large to close. It has a nice strap to carry it with and seems well made for the cost. 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Richardson Small

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the price
customer_reviews.text: My issue with this case is that the net for the joycons is very loose, so it feels like items can move around a lot. I doubt they will since everything is jammed into the case. Another downside is that the picture shows that you can stuff two pairs of joycons on the sides of the case, but I ran into an issue where the joysticks on the joycons attached to the switch would smack into the detached joycons. It's inconvenient, but definitely not a show stopper when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Basic Carrying Case
customer_reviews.text: You want a carrying case and no additional fancy features? This is perfect for you. You are not paying for the design on the outside, the indentations inside for specific accessories, material that will keep your switch from a nuclear blast, just for a simple carrying case. It comes with an insert to put your games, that's useful and nice to have. I put my switch in this thing, put the straps on it, and have no worries about my switch bouncing around in my bag. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a basic carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1317

customer_reviews.title: Strap to hold switch in place broke.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case when I originally got it. Sturdy enough for my switch + a few more accessories in there. However... I haven't had the case for even a month yet and one of the straps to hold my switch in place so it's not even worth getting the thing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sar

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like the case. They can fit all they need to take when they go out. Very convenient and durable. Ands looks really nice too. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M Cano

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my switch last month, but I just started using the case today and right away when I put my switch in and took it back out to test the case the rubber band that holds the switch in place snapped. Kinda upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: This Orzly carry case is amazing. I ordered this case back in March shortly after I purchased my switch and it was by far the best accessory I have purchased. It feels extremely durable and has a nice premium feel. The case looks great and I was surprised by the amount of accessories I can fit in the upper pouch. The 8 slots for the game cartridges is a cool addition as well. Just keep in mind if you like to attach a grip case to your switch it will not fit in this case which is understandable being that the lower part of the case is made to perfectly fit you switch inside.
customer_reviews.author: Effen Hernandez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple case!
customer_reviews.text: Nice case! I like that it can carry all our joycons and has some room for wires, etc if needed. I do wish there was a better solution for the wriststraps but honestly I haven't seen a product that has a solution for this yet. I also wish it was easier to see what games were in the game slots. No matter which direction you put the game, it's impossible to tell what game it is until you slide it out of the slot. To me it is not a huge deal, but kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product. No return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Received this the other day and the switch did not fit securely in the case. The elastic straps are too far a part, and when one is on the device the other cannot reach. It could just be a random defect. However, when I went to return it, it says that this item is not eligible for returns. Had I known that, I would never have purchased this item. While some reviewers seem happy with the item (which is why I bought it), I would say it is not worth the risk, just in case you get stuck with a defective one like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Great, one minor flaw if you’re taking extra joycons with you
customer_reviews.text: The half with the pocket is JUST BARELY too shallow to keep your joycons in without having them press against your switch. I’d worry about the thumb sticks getting messed up when this thing is closed. To fix that, I just made a little LEGO box that keeps them safe. It’s just tall enough to protect the joycons, and short enough to still allow the case to close. If it were maybe a LITTLE thicker so that the joycons would be safe on their own, I’d give it 5 stars. But aside from this minor thing it’s a great case. The elastic straps are nice, the screen protecting flap is soft, and the case itself feels durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for taking my switch back and forth to the hospital while doing chemo. I love that it holds both the unit, charger, and games all in one case. The only thing that i have that does not fit is the external battery pack that attaches to the Switch. One star off for not being able to hold the external battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: deathknight8338

customer_reviews.title: Good without extra controllers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 8 months ago, mainly cause it would fit the Switch with a protective case on it. But now that I am wanting to travel with extra controllers, as shown in the product pictures, you can hear the joysticks being pressed down trying to zipper it closed, and that is without the protective case. So if I have extra controllers, the Switch just moves around inside while also pressing down all the joysticks. Not a bad case, but not great either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, top case for the Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Let me just say that I love this company. I bought the case during the holidays, and apparently they marked their price as cheaper than it should have been. They still shipped the orders for the cheaper price, and sent an apology for the miscommunication from their CEO. When I got the case, they had also sent a free USB type C charger that I now use with my Switch! The product itself is exactly as advertised. Used it on my trip to Florida and had no issues whatsoever. If you're hesitant, don't be.
customer_reviews.author: Adil Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy Switch case
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. It feels very sturdy, which is invaluable when I smash it into my work bag before a trip. I do wish it fit the charger, but the Nintendo wall charger is pretty big. That's not the case's fault. Anyway, the screen cover / game holder is nice. Everything feels well protected, segmented, and secure. The mesh could be a bit tighter, but so far I haven't lost anything, so it's working
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is my second one for another Switch I recently purchased. Along with protecting your switch during transport the extra storage is a nice touch for storing a portable charger and extra joycons. Keep in mind though, the standard base charger included with your switch will not fit in this case; you will need to purchase a portable charger that is for the switch in handheld mode only. Build quality is top notch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: The Switch is great. However, being handheld you have a much greater chance of dropping or damaging it. Therefore a case is recommended for storage and carrying it around. This is a good case that fits the Switch well and has storage for games and other small items. This is one of the first purchases I made after picking up my Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to take the time and review this case. I had low expectations for this case based on the low price it was listed for at the time. I was wrong. This case is outstanding for the price. It is a Simi hard shelled case with plenty of room in it. It can hold numerous games and the system itself. All secure inside. The case itself features no markings, which I think is a major plus cause I don't want to be advertising that I have a $300+ (if you include games) device inside. The case seems well made and well designed. Thanks Orzly for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Holland Green

customer_reviews.title: Mesh pocket does not hold items well
customer_reviews.text: The net in the inside pocket is very short and everything falls out. I did buy a longer charging cord I fit in there, and therefore can't comfortably fit my two extra joycons and the black attachments. But even without the longer charging cord, my stuff still slips out the pocket everytime I open the case...
customer_reviews.author: Samantha P

customer_reviews.title: Pleasingly compact. My go-to for most travel.
customer_reviews.text: When I'm going on the road and don't need a dock, this is the perfect case. It is pretty well form-fitting, and occupies very little space on top of just the console (which I wouldn't dare leave tumbling freely around my backpack). I do have a larger case that holds my dock and some pro controllers, but it's inconvenient to the point where I'm considering just buying controller cases and using this Orzly for the main console.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

product_meta.title: Orzly Carry Case Compatible with Nintendo Switch - Black Protective Hard Portable Travel Carry Case Shell Pouch for Nintendo Switch Console & Accessories
product_meta.description:
Color:BLACK

TRAVEL CASE FOR NINTENDO SWITCH:

Designed to make your new Nintendo Switch Console even more portable & travel friendly.

MULTIPLE STORAGE:

The main bottom section of this case fits the Nintendo Switch tablet with both its Joy-Con controllers attached to it, and the upper section features a separate inner pocket which can fit extra JoyCons, Cables, Games, and other smaller but essential accessories. (Please note this cannot accommodate larger items like the dock or pro-controllers).

TOUGH AND DURABLE:

Hard EVA shell keeps your device protected while the soft inner material keeps your device free from scratches.

ZIP MECHANISM:

Perfect carry case for keeping your Nintendo Switch securely stored when travelling or when not in use.

CUSTOM MADE TO SPECS:

This case is designed specifically for use the Nintendo Switch. For our full range of Nintendo Switch accessories, search 'ORZLY SWITCH' in the Amazon search bar (above).

PLEASE NOTE:

THE NINTENDO SWITCH CONSOLE, CONTROLLERS, AND OTHER ACCESSORIES SHOWN IN IMAGES ARE FOR USAGE DEMONSTRATION PURPOSES ONLY AND ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH THIS CASE.
feature_bullets: Designed to make your new Nintendo Switch Console even more portable & travel friendly

Fits the Nintendo Switch tablet with both its Joy-Con controllers attached to it, and the upper section features a separate inner pocket which can fit extra JoyCons, Cables, Games, and other smaller but essential accessories. (Please note this cannot accommodate larger items like the dock or pro-controllers)
Hard EVA shell keeps your device protected while the soft inner material keeps your device free from scratches
Perfect carry case for keeping your Nintendo Switch securely stored when travelling or when not in use
Designed specifically for the Nintendo Switch. For our full range of Nintendo Switch accessories, search 'ORZLY SWITCH' in the Amazon search bar (above)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars17,335 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
